headline: FactSet and Arcesium Debut Tech To Unite Front, Middle, and Back Office Workflows for Asset Owners and Managers
summary: Amid Industry-Wide Battle Against Opacity, FactSet and Arcesium Deliver End-to-End Unification of Asset Management Lifecycle Across Public, Private, and Alternative MarketsNORWALK, Conn., Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FactSet (NYSE:FDS) (NASDAQ:FDS), a global financial digital platform and enterprise solutions provider, and Arcesium, a leading global financial technology firm for the investment industry, today announced a strategic partnership to deliver a unified investment management offer

content.title: FactSet and Arcesium Debut Tech To Unite Front, Middle, and Back Office Workflows for Asset Owners and Managers
content.summary: Amid Industry-Wide Battle Against Opacity, FactSet and Arcesium Deliver End-to-End Unification of Asset Management Lifecycle Across Public, Private, and Alternative MarketsNORWALK, Conn., Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FactSet (NYSE:FDS) (NASDAQ:FDS), a global financial digital platform and enterprise solutions provider, and Arcesium, a leading global financial technology firm for the investment industry, today announced a strategic partnership to deliver a unified investment management offer
